events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our team.
Your application has been reviewed and categorised under the Engineering department, focusing on software development roles.
A recruiter specializing in engineering positions has been assigned to oversee your application moving forward.
The initial screening interview was completed successfully, and the recruiter was impressed with your background and skills.
We received your prompt and enthusiastic response confirming your availability for the next interview rounds.
Your technical interview has been scheduled with our lead developer for May 10th at 2 PM UTC. Please prepare accordingly.
The technical interview was completed, and feedback indicates strong problem-solving skills and relevant experience.
An HR interview has been scheduled for May 13th at 11 AM UTC to discuss cultural fit and company policies.
Your HR interview went very well, and the team appreciates your alignment with company values.
We are pleased to extend you a formal offer for the Software Engineer position, along with details about benefits and salary.
We received your feedback expressing enthusiasm for the role and requesting minor clarifications on the offer terms.
You have accepted our job offer. We are excited to welcome you aboard as a valued member of our engineering team.
Your onboarding process has started, including access to internal tools and an introduction schedule to the development team.
The hiring process is now closed successfully, and you have officially joined the company as a new software engineer.
